approveTime = #{approveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oaTheme = #{oaTheme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT c.name, date_format(ep.createdTime, '%Y-%m-%d') AS writeTime, ep.photoKey, date_format(ep.createdTime, '%m-%d %H:%i') AS createdTime, (CASE date_format(ep.createdTime, '%w') WHEN 1 THEN '星期一' WHEN 2 THEN '星期二' WHEN 3 THEN '星期三' WHEN 4 THEN '星期四' WHEN 5 THEN '星期五' WHEN 6 THEN '星期六' WHEN 0 THEN '星期日' END) AS weekDay_format FROM gk_expense e JOIN gk_expense_photo ep ON e.id = ep.expenseId JOIN gk_account c ON c.id = e.shopId WHERE ep.empId = #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ep.positionId = #{positionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND date_format(ep.createdTime,'%Y-%m-%e') LIKE concat('%', #{date,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ORDER BY ep.createdTime DESC
